JSRDotNETSDK Reference

JSRDotNET.GetPulserReceivers Method

JSRDotNET Class  See Also

Gets an array of pulser receiver Ids that are within the specified instrument. Alternatively, there is an overload of this method which takes the model number an serial number string as arguments instead of this instrumend identity object. Normally, the application will get the instrument ID object from the InstrumentDiscoveredEvent handler.

Overload List
Name Description
GetPulserReceivers(IInstrumentIdentity) Gets an array of pulser receiver Ids that are within the specified instrument. Alternatively, there is an overload of this method which takes the model number an serial number string as arguments instead of this instrumend identity object. Normally, the application will get the instrument ID object from the InstrumentDiscoveredEvent handler.
GetPulserReceivers(string, string) Gets an array of pulser receiver Ids that are within the instrument specified by the model and serial number string. The model and serial number strings are available from the event argument of the InstrumentDiscoveredEvent handler.
